adHeader: Affordable, Honest, Reliable and Accurate Bookkeeping Services
adDetails: Are you backed up on your bookkeeping? 6 months, 1 year, 5 years? I can help! I am a freelance bookkeeper/accountant available for part-time bookkeeping/accounting jobs. My Qualifications More than 16 years of accounting experience Master's of Science in Accountancy Certified Quickbooks Pro Advisor Fundamentals of Payroll Certification CPA Candidate - passed all 4 parts of CPA exam Take advantage of my many years of experience with QuickBooks, bookkeeping, payroll, and all other business operations. I can handle your bookkeeping tasks such as: Setup Payroll/payroll tax deposits/quarterly reports Sales tax/sales tax deposits/quarterly reports Bank & credit card reconciliations Financial statement/reports Liaison with your CPA/tax preparer General office organization Invoicing/Accounts Receivable Bill paying/Accounts Payable I support all versions of QuickBooks: I offer my services at your convenience: Remote and Onsite Weekly Monthly Quarterly Annually My rate ranges starts at $30 per hour. For questions, please call or text me at show contact info or email me at the above anonymous address. do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
